[[Tribbiani Sisters|Cookie Tribbiani Tribbiani]] (daughter) |actor= [[Brenda Vaccaro]]}}'''Gloria Tribbiani''' is the mother of [[Joey Tribbiani]] and his seven sisters, [[Gina Tribbiani|Gina]], [[Mary-Therse Tribbiani|Mary-Therese]], [[Tribbiani Sisters|Tina, Dina, Mary-Angela, Veronica and Cookie]]. According to Joey and Gina, Gloria was once in a medical journal due to the fact that her pregnancies were all immediately after the preceding birth, resulting in every one of her children being born nine months after the last one. In "[[The One With Rachel's Big Kiss]]", Joey mentions that she hates both the US Postal Service and Irish people. She is married to [[Joey Tribbiani Sr.]] [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:Joey's Family]] [[Category:Mothers]] [[Category:Grandmothers]] [[Category:Season 1 Characters]] [[Category:Females]] [[Category:One Appearance Only]] [[Category:Characters]]
